subSections.title: Definitions
subSections.text:
{{zh-hanzi}}

# [[mugwort]], especially [[Chinese mugwort]] {{gloss|{{taxlink|Artemisia argyi|species}}}}
# {{†}} [[green]]
# {{†}} [[pale]]; [[greyish]] [[white]]
# {{†}} [[beautiful]] [[lady]]
# {{†}} [[elderly]] person
# {{†}} to [[end]]; to [[stop]]
# {{†}} to [[nurture]]; to [[foster]]
# {{lb|zh|historical}} an ancient place in modern-day {{w|Xiushui County}}, [[Jiangxi]]
# {{lb|zh|historical}} a mountain in modern-day {{w|Xintai}}, [[Shandong]]
# {{surname|lang=zh}}
